name: Zombie Beatdown
description:
***From the creators of the hit iPhone game "The Last Ace of Space"!***
***Check out the companion game "Zombie RUNdead"!***

Stressful day? Bad day at school/work? Why not take out all your frustration on the undead? Our scientists at Astro Crow Laboratories have managed to capture a real-live (or rather, real-dead) zombie, and we're giving you the opportunity of a lifetime! We'll give you 60 seconds to give this zombie the beatdown of the century! Launch an uppercut or a hook to the face, or give him a fist in his eye (what's left of it, at least)! Oh, and don't worry about making him cry - zombies don't have feelings!

*Simple, FREE fun for the whole family! ...unless any of your family members are zombies...


MORE GAMES FROM ASTRO CROW

The Last Ace of Space
Zombie RUNdead
